content: wast e l a n d z i p p e r j ac k e t foreword i am not a professional pattern designer so don t expect too much from this i started working on it when i couldn t find a pattern for what i wanted to knit and since i was pretty happy with the results i wanted to share it i graded it but the only size i have tested is size 1 to make the pattern look good larger chest sizes would probably require some form of bust shaping this is an area in which i have no experience in so unfortunately the pattern is not really size inclusive and since english isn t my first language there might be some spelling errors i hope you still enjoy it and if you notice any mistakes please leave a comment on ravelry wasteland © 2026 by artless is licensed under cc by-nc-sa 4 0 -
